title: Huge R package
description: TIGER: A tuning-insensitive approach for optimally estimating Gaussian graphical models

lambda.description: A positive number to control the regularization. Typical usage is to leave the input lambda = NULL and have the program compute its own.

nlambda.description: The number of regularization/thresholding parameters. The default value is 10

select_criterion.description: Model selection criterion. ric and stars are available. The default value is ric.
